derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally bodies): plural of body,retaining the original pronunciation. The term probably first denoted an undergarment, then known as a pair of bodice, although this sense is not recorded until the early 17th cent

entry.def: The bodice of a dress is the part above the waist.

example.ex: ...dress with a fitted bodice and circle skirt.
example.tran: 贴身束胸并搭配圆形下摆的连衣裙
